name: Dragon Shadow Battle Warriors
description:
Dragon Shadow Battle Warriors: is classic game which is popular worldwide. Our character are the greatest Saiyanz Warrior with incredible power. They have Super Saiyan Level between level 1 from level 40. We will update Super Saiyanz Level in each period. Please wait to upgrade your Saiyanz Warrior to the highest level.

All people in the world or VietNam, old men, kid, boys or girls, man or woman know Saiyanz Warriors from Saiyanz Planet. When they maximize power , they will transform KingKong. Each million years, Only have ONE person become LEGEND SUPER SAIYANZ. And top of level is LEVEL 40.

SAIYANZ WARRIORS are stronger when they fight. The more enemies they face to, the stronger they are !

In this game, you will in Saiyanz Hero role and fight with big bosses, the most dangerous enemies in universe. Your enemies will upgrade their power each level, and … they will absolute make you hard to win.
You must fight against 1 enemies, but sometime you will must fight with many enemies at the same time. We believe you will love this fight way. if you want to win, you must upgrade your hero to higher Super Saiyanz Level.

Many skills to perform in game : KAMEHAMEHAA, DRAGON RECALL, Vegeta's Continuos Enegry Bullet, Bigbang Attack, KI BLAST…. and so many other skills.

You will collect many coins after complete each level. And you can use that coins to bring the strongest WARRIORS to your team.

********************* FEATURES *********************
• Easy to play and control.
• 40 Super Saiyanz Levels with amazing graphics.
• 50+ bosses with 100+ skills.
• Many challenges each level
• Many characters to collect and upgrade.

*********************CONTACT US*********************
